title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in the table filter, there are errors on the report page. The error message states: "There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date."
EB: The expected behavior is that the filter should work without errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the report.
2. Set the filter value to new Date("3/2/2005").
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Check if the filter works without errors. The expected result is that the filter should work without any errors being displayed on the report page.
